article_title: Firefighters Quickly Put Out Structure Fire
article_text:
Photo Courtesy of Colorado Springs Fire Department

No one was hurt Saturday morning in a fire that broke out in an apartment on the south side of Colorado Springs.

The fire was reported shortly before 9 a.m. at the Cobblestone Ridge Apartments near Highway 115 and S. Academy.

Firefighters say they were able to contain the fire to one apartment. No one was home at the time.
